page.title: 05Farming cont.
page.content: At East Town Farm the farmer buys young beef cattle in lots of 30 and sells them again at the end of their first year. At Fulling Bridge Farm one third of the land is used for arable crops and the remainder is pasture and managed grassland for the 160 dairy cows + 105 heifers. Cresswell Down Farm in the centre,of the block is a small beef farm. At the time of the survey the herd numbered 30 on ll0 acres of managed grassland. A further ll2 acres outside the block is arable land. In the southern part of the block we found 2 pigs breeding units and an arab stud. In the north east corner there is a deep litter chicken farm.
